mosinstall.name: Top Comment Posters
mosinstall.author: Azrul
mosinstall.description: Top comment posters module for Jom Comment

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of top posters to display (default 5)

param.name: linktype
param.label: Link to
param.description: Link username to specified link type

param.name: avatar
param.label: Avatar
param.description: Enable or disable avatar in module

param.name: aWidth
param.label: Avatar Width
param.description: Set the width of the avatar.

param.name: aHeight
param.label: Avatar Height
param.description: Set the height of the avatar.
